p: It has been reported that insects, in general, can harbor Salmonella Spp., Campylobacter, and Staphylococcus Spp. and fluke foodborne and waterborne pathogens and chemical hazards (Belluco et al., 2013), and this has raised a lot of concerns about the utilization of edible insects as food. Results of the microbial quality test of the biscuits showed that they are safe for consumption (Table 3).
